name: God's Head
description:
play as a person going back  to talk o the head of the shattered god that you used to worship

this is a short "game" (?) which was made for the "I can't write but I wanna make a story" jam
the theme was lost, which I interpeted into "losing faith" due to a random doodle in my notebook

the diffrent paths and endings aren't that diffrent if i'm being honest

kinda really didn't this whole thing by the halfway point but felt like I had to finish it for the sake of finishing.
this is technically my first twine game so yeah
felt like a bunch of pretentious writing :/ hope the next one is better
